ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: Dragoon Dirk - get one a.s.a.p.  20pp or so in or near Crushbone. Sylly. ... From:	John Buenavides [mailto:jbuenavides@yahoo.com] Sent:	Monday, July 26, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Dragoon Dirk - get one a.s.a.p. 20pp or so in or near Crushbone.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Buenavides [mailto:jbuenavides@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 8:13 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Magical Gloves?

From: John Buenavides <jbuenavides@...>

I've been trying to give my bard some method of magical
attacks to
supplement his dissonance (I'm currently level 11 -- can't
wait until
I get below).

So, questions:

1. How much does dissonance with and without the
lute/mandolin
at each level? I've heard 16 damage at level 30, but
that
doesn't help when you're having a hard time getting up
to
20 in the first place.

2. I took the very long trip to Innothule and spent a few
hours
killing frogloks for netted armor. Now, mind you, I
made a
pretty good profit selling all the rusty weapons I could
haul
to Oasis, and I have an almost complete set of netted
armor
to auction off. But I thought that having netted gloves
(which are magical) would let me fight hand to hand
against
magic-only monsters.

3. Are there any weapons/armor out there that we can use as
bards
to supplement our instrumental damage songs?


Many thanks in advance.


--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
----------------------------

ONElist: your connection to people who share your
interests.
